sourcesContent:
import { WeekWrapper } from './style.js' function WeekWeatherCard ({maxTemperature, minTemperature, humidity, icon, date}) { function getBgColor(icon) { switch (icon) { case '01d': case '02d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' case '03d': case '04d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' case '09d': case '10d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(113, 124, 137), rgb(138, 162, 169))' case '11d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' case '13d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' case '50d': return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' default: return 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(237, 106, 90), rgb(244, 241, 187))' } } return( <>

{date}

{humidity}%

min: {minTemperature.toFixed(0)} °C

max: {maxTemperature.toFixed(0)} °C

 ) } export default WeekWeatherCard
